description: stormy seascape; 4 fishermen in foreground pulling net ashore; rock cliff at left with 2 figures on top; sailing ship at center; 3 other ships in right distance and city at left distance

on sheet in black: J Vernet pinx.   fe....(?) 1764 / DEDIE A MR. WATELET/ DE L\'ACADEMIE FRANCOISE / grave d\'apres Le tableau original de Vernet tire du cabinet / de Mr. le Breteuil Ambasscedeur de Sor. Ordre a Rome | on sheet in pencil: 2-
